title: Embroidered lace midi-dress
desc: This lace dress is characterized by a study of womenswear that blends luxury and boldness. Prada reimagines classic garments from a modernist perspective, blending innovative tailoring and contemporary design. The logo in a contrasting color stands out on the front, adding an innovative and iconic note.
